About the Project

Design and Implementation with 8051 Microcontroller,a Temperature Alert System

Skills

  • Microcontroller and Microprocessors
  • Keil IDE
  • Interfacing Sensors
  • ADC

Project Description

  • Temperature Alert System: Developed a comprehensive temperature control system using 8051 Microcontroller and Assembly language.
  • For Quality Control:Implemented temperature monitoring Capabilities to ensure compliance with food safety standards,addressing critical aspects of quality control in the food industry
  • Providing Real Time Data:Designed the System to provide real time temperature data,enabling proactive measures to be taken in response to fluctuations,reducing the risk of product spoilage or damage
  • IOT and Industrial Automation:Demonstrated a commitment to addressing specific industry requirements,making the temperature control a solution a valuable asset in the broader context of IoT and industrial automation
